description: A wide-webbing extraction harness in rope-tan

core:description.text: A heavy-duty harness of wide webbing straps in faded rope-tan, designed for the brutal demands of extraction work. Multiple D-rings provide attachment points for winch lines, tool clips, and emergency rescue cables. The shoulder straps are padded where they cross the chest, and quick-release buckles allow rapid escape if a load goes wrong. Every extraction worker knows this harness is the difference between being pulled to safety and being dragged into the depths.
